text: Python urllib2.open is slow, need a better way to read several urls
As the title suggests, I'm working on a site written in python and it makes several calls to the urllib2 module to read websites.
I then parse them with BeautifulSoup.
As I have to read 5-10 sites, the page takes a while to load.
I'm just wondering if there's a way to read the sites all at once?
Or anytricks to make it faster, like should I close the urllib2.urlopen after each read, or keep it open?
Added: also, if I were to just switch over to php, would that be faster for fetching and Parsi g HTML and XML files from other sites?
I just want it to load faster, as opposed to the ~20 seconds it currently takes
